channel.title: Help with c2.sendMessage

item.title: Help with c2.sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @totalystylin1 totalystylin1
item.description:
@totalystylin1 wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:6, topic:438634”][quote author=totalystylin1 link=topic=541342.msg3965576#msg3965576 date=1333674411]
all i said to do was try it… you never know…

Edit:
Take out the c2. so all it says is sendMessage?
[/quote]

You should understand what you’re talking about before you attempt to help someone.

@Revenge good work with the sendYell method. Looking at your c2, it looks like it’s set-up properly. Do any of your commands use c2 successfully?[/quote]

oh, i knew what i was doing. that’s why i said just try. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Help with c2.sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

You should send the message to the world seperately or else the player will receive the message ("<col=1532693>You have voted already today, thanks!") for as many players are online - 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with c2.sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“totalystylin1, post:4, topic:438634”]all i said to do was try it… you never know…

Edit:
Take out the c2. so all it says is sendMessage?[/quote]

You should understand what you’re talking about before you attempt to help someone.

@Revenge good work with the sendYell method. Looking at your c2, it looks like it’s set-up properly. Do any of your commands use c2 successfully?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with c2.sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("claim")) { if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) { c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000000); c.votePoints += 5; c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>Thanks for voting, you receive 2m and 5 vote points!</col>"); c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>Make sure you vote every 24 hours.</col>"); c.getPA().sendYell("<col=255>[" + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + "]<col=0> has voted and received 2M and 5 votepoints!"); } else { c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>You have voted already today, thanks!</col>"); } }

fixed…

item.title: Help with c2.sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

… I want the message to display to the whole server, Alas why I am using c2.sendMessage…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with c2.sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("claim")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) { c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); c.votePoints+= 10; c.pcPoints+= 15; c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>Thanks for voting, you receive 2m and 5 vote points!</col>"); c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>Make sure you vote every 24 hours.</col>"); c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[FX VOTE BOT] " + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + "<col=0> has voted and received 10M, 15FXP, & 10VP! Use ::vote!"); return; } else { c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>You have voted already today, thanks!</col>"); return; } } } }

The claim command works, compiles with no errors, but doesn’t show the message for the whole server.

Read full topic
